div1.p: The Kellogg children thank Hench for his kindness and the box of taffy.

div1.head: Letter from John and Robin Kellogg to Philip Showalter Hench, January 28, 1942
div1.p:
I hope you will
forgive me for not
writing you sooner.

Since John can
not write a letter
I'm writing for him he and
myself. We both tha.
nk you for the
lovely boxes of taffy,
That happens to be
our favorite candy.

I hope in some way
John & I can repay
you for your kind-
ness, I hope 1942
has no holeserrors,
